io.hekate.spring.bean

Class HekateSpringBootstrap

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.hekate.core.HekateBootstrap
      • io.hekate.spring.bean.HekateSpringBootstrap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean<Hekate>, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<org.springframework.context.event.ContextRefreshedEvent>

    public class HekateSpringBootstrap
extends HekateBootstrap
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean<Hekate>, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<org.springframework.context.event.ContextRefreshedEvent>
    « start hereMain entry point to Spring Framework integration.

    Overview

    All configurable components and service factories of Hekate can be used as plain Spring <bean>s and can be configured via <property> setters. This class provides an extension of HekateBootstrap class that makes it possible to easily configure Hekate nodes and bound them to the lifecycle of Spring context.

    Module dependency

    Spring Framework integration is provided by the 'hekate-spring' module and can be imported into the project dependency management system as in the example below:

    • Maven
    • Gradle
    • Ivy
    
 <dependency>
   <groupId>io.hekate</groupId>
   <artifactId>hekate-spring</artifactId>
   <version>2.4.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
 </dependency>
 
    
 compile group: 'io.hekate', name: 'hekate-spring', version: '2.4.0-SNAPSHOT'
 
    
 <dependency org="io.hekate" name="hekate-spring" rev="2.4.0-SNAPSHOT"/>

    Configuration

    Hekate nodes can be configured by using two approaches:

    1. By using <bean> tag from Spring's default XML namespace and setting all configuration options via <property> tag and nested beans.
    2. By using an extension of Spring XML schema with Hekate-specific XML namespace: http://www.hekate.io/spring/hekate-core

    Below is the example of a minimalistic Hekate node bean with all configuration options set to their default values.

    • Spring XSD
    • Spring bean
    
<beans xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
    xmlns:h="http://www.hekate.io/spring/hekate-core"
    xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
    xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
        http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
        http://www.hekate.io/spring/hekate-core
        http://www.hekate.io/spring/hekate-core.xsd">

    <!-- Node with all configuration options set to their default values. -->
    <h:node id="hekate" name="my-node" cluster="my-cluster"/>

</beans>

    
<beans xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
    xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
    xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
        http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd">

    <!-- Node with all configuration options set to their default values. -->
    <bean id="hekate" class="io.hekate.spring.bean.HekateSpringBootstrap">
        <property name="nodeName" value="my-node"/>
        <property name="clusterName" value="my-cluster"/>
    </bean>

</beans>

    ...and a more complete example

    • Spring XSD
    • Spring bean
    
<s:beans xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
    xmlns:s="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
    xmlns="http://www.hekate.io/spring/hekate-core"
    xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
        http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
        http://www.hekate.io/spring/hekate-core
        http://www.hekate.io/spring/hekate-core.xsd">
    <node id="hekate" name="my-node" cluster="my-cluster">
        <!-- Node roles. -->
        <roles>
            <role>role 1</role>
            <role>role 2</role>
        </roles>

        <!-- Node properties. -->
        <properties>
            <prop name="prop 1">prop val 1</prop>
            <prop name="prop 2">prop val 2</prop>
        </properties>

        <!-- Default data serialization options. -->
        <default-codec>
            <s:bean class="io.hekate.codec.JdkCodecFactory"/>
        </default-codec>

        <!-- Network service. -->
        <network host="any-ip4" port="10012" port-range="100"
            nio-threads="1"
            connect-timeout-ms="3000"
            accept-retry-interval-ms="1000"
            heartbeat-interval-ms="1000"
            heartbeat-loss-threshold="3"
            tcp-no-delay="true">
        </network>

        <!-- Cluster service. -->
        <cluster gossip-interval-ms="1000" gossip-speedup-size="100">
            <seed-node-provider>
                <multicast group="224.1.2.12" port="45454" interval-ms="200" wait-time-ms="1000" ttl="3"/>
            </seed-node-provider>
            <failure-detection>
                <heartbeat interval-ms="500" loss-threshold="6" quorum="2"/>
            </failure-detection>
        </cluster>

        <!-- Messaging service. -->
        <messaging>
            <channel name="some.channel" nio-threads="1" log-category="foo.bar.Channel">
                <receiver>
                    <s:bean class="foo.bar.SomeMessageReceiver"/>
                </receiver>
            </channel>
        </messaging>

        <!-- Lock service. -->
        <locks>
            <region name="region1">
                <lock name="someLock1"/>
                <lock name="someLock2"/>
            </region>
        </locks>

        <!-- Coordination service. -->
        <coordination>
            <process name="someProcess1">
                <handler>
                    <s:bean class="foo.bar.SomeCoordinationHandler"/>
                </handler>
            </process>
        </coordination>

        <!-- Leader election service. -->
        <election>
            <candidate group="someGroup1">
                <s:bean class="foo.bar.SomeCandidate"/>
            </candidate>
        </election>

        <!-- Local metrics service. -->
        <local-metrics refresh-interval-ms="1000">
            <counters>
                <counter name="counter1"/>
            </counters>
            <probes>
                <probe name="probe1" init-value="1">
                    <s:bean class="foo.bar.SomeProbe"/>
                </probe>
            </probes>
        </local-metrics>

        <!-- Cluster metrics service. -->
        <cluster-metrics replication-interval-ms="1000"/>
    </node>
</s:beans>

    
<beans xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
    xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
    xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
        http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd">

    <bean id="hekate" class="io.hekate.spring.bean.HekateSpringBootstrap">
        <property name="nodeName" value="my-node"/>
        <property name="clusterName" value="my-cluster"/>
        <!-- Node roles. -->
        <property name="roles">
            <list>
                <value>role 1</value>
                <value>role 2</value>
            </list>
        </property>
        <!-- Node properties. -->
        <property name="properties">
            <map>
                <entry key="prop 1" value="prop val 1"/>
                <entry key="prop 2" value="prop val 2"/>
            </map>
        </property>
        <!-- Default data serialization options. -->
        <property name="defaultCodec">
            <bean class="io.hekate.codec.JdkCodecFactory"/>
        </property>
        <!-- Services configuration.-->
        <property name="services">
            <list>
                <!-- Network service. -->
                <bean class="io.hekate.network.NetworkServiceFactory">
                    <!-- Node address selection options. -->
                    <property name="host" value="any-ip4"/>
                    <property name="port" value="10001"/>
                    <property name="portRange" value="100"/>
                    <property name="nioThreads" value="1"/>
                    <property name="connectTimeout" value="3000"/>
                    <property name="acceptRetryInterval" value="1000"/>
                    <property name="heartbeatInterval" value="1000"/>
                    <property name="heartbeatLossThreshold" value="3"/>
                    <property name="tcpNoDelay" value="true"/>
                </bean>
                <!-- Cluster service. -->
                <bean class="io.hekate.cluster.ClusterServiceFactory">
                    <property name="gossipInterval" value="1000"/>
                    <property name="speedUpGossipSize" value="100"/>
                    <property name="seedNodeProvider">
                        <bean class="io.hekate.cluster.seed.multicast.MulticastSeedNodeProvider">
                            <constructor-arg>
                                <bean class="io.hekate.cluster.seed.multicast.MulticastSeedNodeProviderConfig">
                                    <property name="group" value="224.1.2.12"/>
                                    <property name="port" value="45454"/>
                                    <property name="interval" value="200"/>
                                    <property name="waitTime" value="1000"/>
                                    <property name="ttl" value="2"/>
                                </bean>
                            </constructor-arg>
                        </bean>
                    </property>
                    <property name="failureDetector">
                        <bean class="io.hekate.cluster.health.DefaultFailureDetector">
                            <constructor-arg>
                                <bean class="io.hekate.cluster.health.DefaultFailureDetectorConfig">
                                    <property name="heartbeatInterval" value="500"/>
                                    <property name="heartbeatLossThreshold" value="6"/>
                                    <property name="failureDetectionQuorum" value="2"/>
                                </bean>
                            </constructor-arg>
                        </bean>
                    </property>
                </bean>
                <!-- Messaging service. -->
                <bean class="io.hekate.messaging.MessagingServiceFactory">
                    <property name="channels">
                        <bean class="io.hekate.messaging.MessagingChannelConfig">
                            <property name="name" value="some.channel"/>
                            <property name="nioThreads" value="1"/>
                            <property name="logCategory" value="foo.bar.Channel"/>
                            <property name="receiver">
                                <bean class="foo.bar.SomeMessageReceiver"/>
                            </property>
                        </bean>
                    </property>
                </bean>
                <!-- Lock service. -->
                <bean class="io.hekate.lock.LockServiceFactory">
                    <property name="regions">
                        <list>
                            <bean class="io.hekate.lock.LockRegionConfig">
                                <property name="name" value="region1"/>
                            </bean>
                        </list>
                    </property>
                </bean>
                <!-- Coordination service. -->
                <bean class="io.hekate.coordinate.CoordinationServiceFactory">
                    <property name="processes">
                        <list>
                            <bean class="io.hekate.coordinate.CoordinationProcessConfig">
                                <property name="name" value="someProcess1"/>
                                <property name="handler">
                                    <bean class="foo.bar.SomeCoordinationHandler"/>
                                </property>
                            </bean>
                        </list>
                    </property>
                </bean>
                <!-- Leader election service. -->
                <bean class="io.hekate.election.ElectionServiceFactory">
                    <property name="candidates">
                        <list>
                            <bean class="io.hekate.election.CandidateConfig">
                                <property name="group" value="someGroup1"/>
                                <property name="candidate">
                                    <bean class="foo.bar.SomeCandidate"/>
                                </property>
                            </bean>
                        </list>
                    </property>
                </bean>
                <!-- Local metrics service. -->
                <bean class="io.hekate.metrics.local.LocalMetricsServiceFactory">
                    <property name="metrics">
                        <list>
                            <bean class="io.hekate.metrics.local.CounterConfig">
                                <property name="name" value="counter1"/>
                            </bean>
                            <bean class="io.hekate.metrics.local.ProbeConfig">
                                <property name="name" value="probe1"/>
                                <property name="initValue" value="1"/>
                                <property name="probe">
                                    <bean class="foo.bar.SomeProbe"/>
                                </property>
                            </bean>
                        </list>
                    </property>
                </bean>
                <!-- Cluster metrics service. -->
                <bean class="io.hekate.metrics.cluster.ClusterMetricsServiceFactory">
                    <property name="replicationInterval" value="1000"/>
                </bean>
            </list>
        </property>
    </bean>
</beans>

      • isDeferredJoin

        public boolean isDeferredJoin()
        the flag indicating that Hekate node should not join the cluster during the Spring context initialization (see setDeferredJoin(boolean)).
        Returns:
        true if node should be joined manually.

      • setDeferredJoin

        public void setDeferredJoin(boolean deferredJoin)
        Sets the flag indicating that Hekate node should not join the cluster during the Spring context initialization.

        If set to true then node should be joined manually by the application logic via Hekate.join() method.

        Default value of this parameter is false.

        Parameters:
        deferredJoin - true if node should be joined manually.
